>> f=@(x) x*x-4

f =

  function_handle with value:

    @(x)x*x-4

>> [x,history] = HW2bisect(f,0,3,1e-8);
>> format short
>> x

x =

    2.0000

>> format long
>> x

x =

   1.999999998137355

>> history

history =

ans =

     3

>> a=history(:,1);
>> b=history(:,2);
>> m=(a+b)/2;
>> plot(m,'r*')
>> k=1:length(m);
>> plot(k,m,'r*')
